name: SpacMan
description:
This game was made as an entry for Infix Studio's Game Jam aka Infix Game Jam.

As per the theme of the game jam, which is "Recreate", I recreated Pac-Man with some "Among Us" touches and presenting to you

Spac-Man

The rules of the game are :
-Avoid getting in contact with an IMPOSTER which is looking like VENOM
-Collect all the points in order to win the game.

Controlls:

-Hold "W" to move up.
-Hold "S" to move down.
-Hold "A" to move left.
-Hold "D" to move right
